SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_OS_FOR_COMPONENT_FLOW
:print Initial value of ARTIFACT_INSTANCE_ID# &ARTIFACT_INSTANCE_ID#
:SET &CHECK# = STR_STARTS_WITH(&ARTIFACT_INSTANCE_ID#,"EXT:") :IF &CHECK# EQ "Y" ! Artifact Instance ID was not set by a Dynamic Property : pset &ARTIFACT_INSTANCE_ID# = 0 :endif
:print ARTIFACT_INSTANCE_ID# set to &ARTIFACT_INSTANCE_ID#

DOCU_Docu.DOC: Template workflow to install an application on a JBoss server
